name: Team USA Basketball
overview: A team like this comes along once in a lifetime! Give the world a driving lesson it will never forget. Each team USA member's style of play is authentic, right down to individual signature moves. Dominate in Barcelona and teach the world how to sing our national anthem. Rule the world court. Team USA Basketball is full 5-on-5 action with international rules. See how well the American brand of hoops translates!
